Learned Commands

Comandos Description
cd Allows to change between folders.
ls Gives a list of files.
cat Shows the file content.
clear Clean the terminal.

Useful Aliases

alias cl='clear'

alias f='find . |grep '
Aliases Description
cl Clean the terminal.
f Search a file.
